Title: Relates to the formula for the two percent property tax cap
Summary: Enacts the "two percent is two percent property tax cap act"; provides that the "allowable levy growth factor" shall be one and two one-hundredths.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L; amd ยง2023-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the education law, in relation to the formula for the real property tax cap
